short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run code snippets in Github Gist on the click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your go-to 💡 for running 🏃‍♂️ code snippets directly on GitHub! 

This handy ⚒️ extension adds a "Run" button to Gists, letting you execute code and view results📊 without leaving the page. No more 😣 copying snippets elsewhere to test them.

🆕 Run JavaScript, Python, Ruby, and more with just one click. Output displays below the code, along with helpful error messages if needed. 

🌟 Super simple and convenient for testing and sharing code examples. The perfect chrome extension👌 for any developer or coding enthusiast!

🔄 Auto-updates to keep up with the latest Gist versions. Enjoy seamless execution right from your browser.

💻 Install now and take your GitHub workflow to the next level! Execute Gists with ease 😎
